testcase.name: Validate various root page features of Swiggy application
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user tries to see the title of the page................................passed Then page title should be "Order food online from India's best food delivery service. Order from restaurants near you".passed When user tries to see the login and sign in link...........................passed Then login and sign in link should be visible with the text "Login" and "Sign up".passed When user tries to see the delivery location text box & find food button....passed Then delivery location text box should be visible with placed holder value "Enter your delivery location".passed And find food button should be visible with the text "FIND FOOD"............passed When user tries to see the information of popular <cities> in india.........passed Then system should be showing the links with below city name................passed When user enters the location "Kumbakonam" in the search text box...........passed Then system should list the possible locations as a drop down list..........passed When user chooses the desired location "Kumbakonam Temples, Kanmani Devi Nagar, Kumbakonam, Tamil Nadu, India" from the drop down list.passed Then system should navigate the user to restaurants page with the url "https://www.swiggy.com/restaurants".passed
